name: Family1st
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family first
Developer Terms of Use
des: Once Family1st users have linked their Family1st account to Alexa, this skill allows for users to readily review the location of their device(s). By taking advantage of Alexa's voice interaction, Family1st users can immediately know the status of their devices and the Real-Time location of the assets or loved ones being tracked.
